match.title: MI Cape Town vs Joburg Super Kings, 15th Match

content.overview: The SA20 2025-26 season moves forward as MI Cape Town host Joburg Super Kings in Match No. 15 at Newlands, Cape Town.
content.match_details:
Match: MI Cape Town vs Joburg Super Kings, 15th Match
Tournament: SA20 2025-26
Date: 6 January 2026
Venue: Newlands, Cape Town
content.pitch_report: Newlands traditionally offers assistance to seamers early with true bounce. Batting becomes easier as the match progresses.

squads.Joburg Super Kings: Matthew De Villiers, Faf du Plessis(c), Rilee Rossouw, Wiaan Mulder, Donovan Ferreira, Prenelan Subrayen, Akeal Hosein, Richard Gleeson, Reece Topley, Imran Tahir
squads.MI Cape Town: Ryan Rickelton(w), Rassie van der Dussen, Reeza Hendricks, Nicholas Pooran, Rashid Khan(c), Kagiso Rabada, Trent Boult

content.prediction: Joburg Super Kings enter as favourites due to strong form.
content.final_word: MI Cape Town need a turnaround, while Joburg Super Kings look set to continue their dominance.
